content.heading: e-Parking
content.description:
Create app ecosystem for smart parking solutions for cars:
- Kiosk app that controls parking operations.
- Web app that manages user, parking data.
- Core service APIs using AWS Lambda.
- Marketing website.
paragraphs: Develops core APIs e-Parking's app ecosystem using AWS lambda. Store/retrieve data (user, device, parking, analytic) of the system in AWS Dynamo.
Develops kiosk controller app, it acts as an automatic device which helps in controlling operation of the parking & replacing the human works. It's built on ElectronJs, ReactJs & MQTT protocol.
Develops web app, which helps in managing user, parking data. It's built on NextJs & MQTT protocol.
content.scope: R&D multiple applications for IoT system of e-Parking organization.
